results.title: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie
results.creator_credit: Aaron Paul, Vince Gilligan, Melissa Bernstein, Charles Newirth, Judy Rhee, Mark Johnson, Louise Frogley, High Bridge Entertainment, Gran Via Productions and Sony Pictures Television
results.brief_description: In the wake of his dramatic escape from captivity, Jesse Pinkman must come to terms with his past in order to forge some kind of future.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

results.title: Eddie Izzard: Circle
results.brief_description: Town Hall, New York City, 26 June 2000. An evening with Eddie Izzard in which he moves back and forth in time, with religion as the loose but constant theme.

constellations_other.name: Stop-motion fantasies
constellations_other.description: The LEGO Movie draws on fan-made stop-motion films for its aesthetic style, but fantastical animation comes in many forms.

results.title: Eat Pray Love
results.creator_credit: Ryan Murphy, Bill Groom, Michael Dennison, Jennifer Salt, Dede Gardner, Plan B Entertainment, Columbia Pictures and Red Om Films
results.brief_description: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life.

constellations_other.name: Film and TV dreams
constellations_other.description: Fleetwood Mac's 'Dreams' coasted its way back up the charts 40 years after it was first released, thanks to Nathan Apodaca's joyous viral TikTok, but Fleetwood Mac (and Stevie Knicks) have been main staples of screen culture for decades.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ryan Murphy, Bill Groom, Michael Dennison, Jennifer Salt, Dede Gardner, Plan B Entertainment, Columbia Pictures and Red Om Films
results.description: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life. Newly divorced and at a crossroads, Gilbert steps out of her comfort zone, risking everything to change her life, embarking on a journey around the world that becomes a quest for self-discovery. In her travels, she discovers the true pleasure of nourishment by eating in Italy, the power of prayer in India and, finally and unexpectedly, the inner peace and balance of true love in Bali.
description_for_label: Liz Gilbert had everything a modern woman is supposed to dream of having – a husband, a house and a successful career – yet like so many others, she found herself lost, confused and searching for what she really wanted in life. Newly divorced and at a crossroads, Gilbert steps out of her comfort zone, risking everything to change her life, embarking on a journey around the world that becomes a quest for self-discovery. In her travels, she discovers the true pleasure of nourishment by eating in Italy, the power of prayer in India and, finally and unexpectedly, the inner peace and balance of true love in Bali.

results.title: Eat Drink Man Woman
results.headline_credit: Taiwan and United States of America, 1994
results.brief_description: The film tells the story of a retired and widowed Chinese master chef Chu (Si Hung Lung) and his family living in modern day Taipei, Taiwan.

constellations_other.name: Culture, food and family
constellations_other.description: Food as a link to culture and family.

results.description: The film tells the story of a retired and widowed Chinese master chef Chu (Si Hung Lung) and his family living in modern day Taipei, Taiwan. At the start of the film, he lives with his three attractive daughters, all of whom are unattached. As the film progresses, each of the daughters encounters new men in their lives. When these new relationships blossom, the stereotypes are broken and the living situation within the family changes.. The film features several scenes displaying the techniques and artistry of gourmet Chinese cooking. Since the family members have difficulty expressing their love for each other, the intricate preparation of banquet quality dishes for their Sunday dinners is the surrogate for their familial feelings.
description_for_label: The film tells the story of a retired and widowed Chinese master chef Chu (Si Hung Lung) and his family living in modern day Taipei, Taiwan. At the start of the film, he lives with his three attractive daughters, all of whom are unattached. As the film progresses, each of the daughters encounters new men in their lives. When these new relationships blossom, the stereotypes are broken and the living situation within the family changes.. The film features several scenes displaying the techniques and artistry of gourmet Chinese cooking. Since the family members have difficulty expressing their love for each other, the intricate preparation of banquet quality dishes for their Sunday dinners is the surrogate for their familial feelings.

results.title: East West 101
results.brief_description: Zane Malik and the Major Crime Squad investigate crime and murder in all quarters of multicultural Sydney.

constellations_other.name: 2000s TV
constellations_other.description: The dawn of the new millennium brought a wave of Australian programming that was more ambitious and bolder than previous decades.

results.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
results.creator_credit: Carlo Rambaldi, Melissa Mathison, Kathleen Kennedy, Steven Spielberg, Al Bailey, James D. Bissell, Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: After a gentle alien becomes stranded on Earth, the being is discovered and befriended by a young boy named Elliott. Bringing the extraterrestrial into his suburban California house, Elliott introduces E.T., as the alien is dubbed, to his brother and his little sister, Gertie, and the children decide to keep its existence a secret. Soon, however, E.T. falls ill, resulting in government intervention and a dire situation for both Elliott and the alien.

constellations_other.name: The drama and nuance of silhouette
constellations_other.description: Ali Gumillya Baker uses silhouette to evocative effect in her work reimagining the colonial gaze. The lighting technique has long been employed by filmmakers for its ability to dramatically convey a wide variety of emotions in everything from film noir to animation and whimsy.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Carlo Rambaldi, Melissa Mathison, Kathleen Kennedy, Steven Spielberg, Al Bailey, James D. Bissell, Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures

Soon, however, E.T. falls ill, resulting in government intervention and a dire situation for both Elliott and the alien.

results.title: Dunkirk
results.creator_credit: Jeffrey Kurland, Cesha Ventre, RatPac-Dune Entertainment, Ciné+, Kaap Holland Film, Dombey Street Productions, Syncopy, Warner Bros. Pictures, Canal+, Christopher Nolan, Emma Thomas and Nathan Crowley
results.headline_credit: France, Netherlands, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: The story of the miraculous evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, Britain, Canada and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbour of Dunkirk between May 26th and June 4th 1940 during World War II.

results.title: Duck Soup
results.brief_description: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

constellations_other.name: Reflecting duality and revealing new realities
constellations_other.description: The Toupie Fantoche relies on four prismatic mirrors to reflect changes in animation states.

results.title: Driving Miss Daisy
results.creator_credit: Elizabeth McBride, Bruno Rubeo, John P. Mesa, Alfred Uhry, Lili Fini Zanuck, Bruce Beresford, Robert Doudell, Richard D. Zanuck, Warner Bros. Pictures, Majestic Films International and The Zanuck Company
results.brief_description: The story of an old Jewish widow named Daisy Werthan and her relationship with her black chauffeur, Hoke. From an initial mere work relationship grew in 25 years a strong friendship between the two very different characters in a time when those types of relationships where shunned.

constellations_other.name: Fred Schepisi
constellations_other.description: Fred Schepisi's diverse body of work connects to acclaimed local productions, westerns and Hollywood favourites.

results.title: Drive
results.creator_credit: FilmDistrict, Bold Films, Marc Platt Productions, OddLot Entertainment, Motel Movies, Newbridge Film Capital, Nicolas Winding Refn, Gigi Pritzker, Adam Siegel, Hossein Amini, Beth Mickle, Michel Litvak, Erin Benach, John Palermo and Marc Platt
results.brief_description: Driver is a skilled Hollywood stuntman who moonlights as a getaway driver for criminals. Though he projects an icy exterior, lately he’s been warming up to a pretty neighbor named Irene and her young son, Benicio.

constellations_other.name: Electric Sound Supercut: composers and their distinctive other worlds
constellations_other.description: Electric sound is commonly associated with science fiction narratives for its auditory oddness, which has symbolised other worldly environments, the unconscious and the 1980s.

results.creator_credit_for_label: FilmDistrict, Bold Films, Marc Platt Productions, OddLot Entertainment, Motel Movies, Newbridge Film Capital, Nicolas Winding Refn, Gigi Pritzker, Adam Siegel, Hossein Amini, Beth Mickle, Michel Litvak, Erin Benach, John Palermo and Marc Platt
results.description: Driver is a skilled Hollywood stuntman who moonlights as a getaway driver for criminals. Though he projects an icy exterior, lately he’s been warming up to a pretty neighbor named Irene and her young son, Benicio. When Irene’s husband gets out of jail, he enlists Driver’s help in a million-dollar heist. The job goes horribly wrong, and Driver must risk his life to protect Irene and Benicio from the vengeful masterminds behind the robbery.
